knowAboutTitle: Learn more about David Alexandre Fernandes
descriptionAboutMe: I am originally from Mato Grosso and currently live in the metropolitan region of São Paulo. I graduated as an Electronics Technician and as a Systems Development Technician at ETEC, and I am currently pursuing a Computer Science degree at UNASP University Center. I continuously invest in specialization programs across multiple technologies and digital solutions. My career started in electronic engineering, with over 5 years of experience, and then transitioned to technology, where I have over 4 years of experience in test automation and full stack development. Today, I work as a full cycle developer with DevOps and SRE responsibilities, supporting products and services in blockchain (NFT), metaverse, and Artificial Intelligence.
